info.name: IntroVox
info.summary: Interactive onboarding tour for new Nextcloud users
info.description:
IntroVox provides a user-friendly guided tour that helps new users get started with Nextcloud.
**Features:** * Interactive step-by-step tour through Nextcloud's main features * PWA installation guide with device-specific instructions * Full admin interface for customizing tour steps * Global enable/disable control for administrators * Personal settings for users to restart the tour * Automatically adapts to your Nextcloud theme * Privacy-focused: all data stored locally
**Perfect for:** * Nextcloud administrators who want to improve user onboarding * Organizations deploying Nextcloud to new users * Anyone who wants to help users discover Nextcloud features
Built with Vue 3 and Shepherd.js for a smooth, modern user experience.
